text: Ben M. Skall (February 11, 1919 – October 25, 1993) was a member of the Ohio Senate, serving from 1981 to 1984. He represented the 22nd District, which was based out of Cuyahoga County, Ohio. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:Ohio state senators Category:1993 deaths Category:Ohio Republicans Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Ben Skall
